thread.title: New York Luxury
thread.title_full: New York Luxury - Review of The Beekman, A Thompson Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: sesposi2
title: New York Luxury
text: My stay at the Beekman was simply delightful. The staff is first-rate - attended to everything I asked for - and the hotel is simply exquisite. The decor is authentic Victorian with actual antiques everywhere. The food was delicious - I had the fresh-baked brioche toast with homemade cheese and marmalade topped with the thinnest slices of tomato - delicious - and the coffee was excellent as well! The evening before we had quite a party in the bar - everyone at our firm attended - and the most tasty Baked Alaska I have ever eaten. I am very much looking forward to a return trip in the near future.
